content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
### Iron Smelting Furnace at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0)
Use-case: Processes iron ore and coal into iron plates.
Consists of:
– Furnace at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0)

### Copper Smelting Furnace at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0)
Use-case: Processes copper ore and coal into copper plates.
Consists of:
– Furnace at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0)

Note: Repeated attempts to locate, craft, and place a Lab (intended at Position(x=0.5, y=2.5) for supplying Automation Science Packs) were unsuccessful; no Lab is present on the map.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• Errors in get_entities calls:
 – When calling get_entities, unsupported keyword arguments (such as “radius”) and incorrect numbers of positional arguments were used.
 – Tip: Verify the API’s signature before invocation and use the correct parameter format.

• Lab placement failures:
 – Attempts to place a Lab failed because the Lab item was not available in the inventory.
 – Tip: Confirm that the required Lab is present in inventory before attempting placement at a specific coordinate.

• Iteration over None:
 – An error occurred when processing a value of None as an iterable during Lab retrieval.
 – Tip: Check that entity-retrieval functions return a valid list (or default to an empty list) before iterating.

• Lab crafting resource shortages:
 – Lab crafting repeatedly failed due to missing sub-ingredients (for example, insufficient iron-gear-wheels, electronic circuits, and copper cables).
 – Tip: Ensure that all prerequisite resources and intermediate products (such as iron plates, copper plates, copper cables, and iron-gear-wheels) are produced in sufficient quantities before attempting to craft a Lab.
